summary: A website for Airbnb rental property 'veebirstays' showcasing the listing
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero banner image showing a welcoming vacation rental property exterior or interior with natural lighting (hero-property.dim_1920x800.png)
- Placeholder amenity icons set including WiFi, kitchen, parking, and TV in a consistent style (amenities-icons.dim_600x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create a landing page showcasing the Airbnb property with property name 'Veebirstays' and listing details from https://www.airbnb.co.in/rooms/1582766952093298603
Display property amenities and features including WiFi, kitchen facilities, and other amenities mentioned in the Airbnb listing
Include a booking section with a call-to-action button that links to the Airbnb listing URL https://www.airbnb.co.in/rooms/1582766952093298603
Create a property details section showing location information, guest capacity, bedroom/bathroom count, and property type
Implement a cohesive visual design with a warm, inviting aesthetic using earthy tones (terracotta, warm whites, sage green) and clean typography that reflects hospitality and comfort
